biotools.summary: A Gene Ontology enrichment tool, specifically designed for the abundance bias in Mass Spectrometry (MS) based proteomics data. This site can be used for functional annotation enrichment for proteomics data. It contains tools for abundance corrected functional enrichment and supports the following categories: GO-terms, UniProt-keywords, KEGG-pathways, Reactome, WikiPathways, InterPro, Pfam, PubMed Publications, Diseaeses, Tissues, and Compartments.
